GET /api.description: json file with all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/collection.description: return an array of all exhibition collections

GET /api/collection/id/:id_collection.description: return the collection with id = id_collection

GET /api/collection/:user_mail.description: return the collections with user_mail = user_mail

POST /api/collection.description: insert a new row in the collection table, return the collection inserted

PATCH /api/collection/:id_collection.description: update the row with collection = to id_collection and return the collection updated

DELETE /api/collection/:id_collection.description: delete the row with collection = to id_collection and return the collection deleted

GET /api/artwork.description: return an array of all artworks

GET /api/artwork/:id_artwork.description: return the artwork with id = id_artwork

GET /api/artwork/collecton/:id_collectio.description: return an array with all the artworks with id_collection = to the param

POST /api/artwork.description: insert a new row in the artworks table, return the row inserted

PATCH /api/artwork/:id_artwork.description: update the row with id_artwork = to id as param and return the row updated

DELETE /api/artwork/:id_artwork.description: delete the row with id = to id_artwork
